Philippines still off target of 30k COVID-19 tests daily, says expert tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739731 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739731/philippines-still-off-target-of-30k-covid-19-tests-daily-says-expert/story/ Earlier on Monday, Harry Roque said that the Philippines increased its testing capacity to 32,100 on May 20. Data from the Department of Health (DOH), however, show that only 8,179 samples were processed on May 20. Mon, 25 May 2020 23:06:19 +0800
COVID-19 test kits seized in Batangas tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739730 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739730/covid-19-test-kits-seized-in-batangas/story/ Operatives seized a total of 144 COVID-19 rapid test kits worth P252,000 at the BCA Diagnostic Center in Sto. Tomas. Mon, 25 May 2020 22:55:19 +0800
Healthcare workers with COVID-19 now 2,394 with 1,153 recoveries tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739728 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739728/healthcare-workers-with-covid-19-now-2-394-with-1-153-recoveries/story/ The number of healthcare workers who have contracted the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has climbed to 2,394, the Department of Health (DOH) reported on Monday. Mon, 25 May 2020 22:45:33 +0800
13-anyos na dalagitang kaka-birthday lang, patay nang gumuho ang bahay nila sa tabing-ilog sa QC tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739727 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739727/13-anyos-na-dalagitang-kaka-birthday-lang-patay-nang-gumuho-ang-bahay-nila-sa-tabing-ilog-sa-qc/story/ Patay ang isang dalagita at sugatan naman ang kaniyang dalawang kapatid at lola matapos gumuho sa ilog ang kanilang bahay sa Quezon City. Mon, 25 May 2020 22:22:25 +0800
Army reservist shoves mechanic for not wearing facemask inside own yard tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739714 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/739714/army-reservist-shoves-mechanic-for-not-wearing-facemask-inside-own-yard/story/ An Army reservist shouted at a mechanic and shoved him to the ground inside the latter's own yard in Barangay Sta. Lucia, Dasmariñas, Cavite on Saturday. Mon, 25 May 2020 22:11:07 +0800
Thai researcher eyes affordable, accessible coronavirus vaccine for SE Asia tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739724 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739724/thai-researcher-eyes-affordable-accessible-coronavirus-vaccine-for-se-asia/story/ A researcher leading Thailand's push to manufacture a coronavirus vaccine says its aim is to make it cost-effective and accessible to Southeast Asia, and play a part in preventing a supply shortage globally. Mon, 25 May 2020 22:07:54 +0800
Reactivated DOST unit to focus on collaborations for COVID-19 treatment tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739726 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739726/reactivated-dost-unit-to-focus-on-collaborations-for-covid-19-treatment/story/ The Department of Science and Technology (DOST) revived a defunct unit which shall focus on linking various stakeholders in the country for the development of a possible COVID-19 treatment, according to Duterte's latest report to Congress. Mon, 25 May 2020 22:07:37 +0800
DepEd doesn t have enough computers for online education, says official tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739723 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739723/deped-doesn-t-have-enough-computers-for-online-education-says-official/story/ “Hindi rin talaga kaya ng DepEd na 1:1 ang equipment mo pagdating sa mga bata. Biruin mo, kung 1:1 yan, ang kailangan natin ay aabutin tayo ng 22 million ang kailangan nating equipment,” Education Undersecretary Alain Pascua said. “Sa ngayon, ang inventory natin, mga one million pa lang,” he added. Mon, 25 May 2020 21:48:09 +0800
DOT has identified 50K rooms for quarantine of repatriated OFWs --Duterte report tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739721 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739721/dot-has-identified-50k-rooms-for-quarantine-of-repatriated-ofws-duterte-report/story/ Around 50,000 rooms in various accommodation establishments in the country have been identified by the Department of Tourism (DOT) as venues for the mandatory quarantine of returning overseas Filipino workers, according to President Rodrigo Duterte's latest report to Congress. Mon, 25 May 2020 21:37:49 +0800
Blind lola begs amid pandemic for orphaned grandkids tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739722 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/739722/blind-lola-begs-amid-pandemic-for-orphaned-grandkids/story/ A 70-year-old grandmother spends her days begging for change along Amang Rodriguez Avenue in Pasig City in order to feed her three grandchildren who were orphaned by their mother.“Kailangan ko po kasi yung pang-araw araw namin sa ngayon. Lalo na yung mga apo ko… e minsan po walang wala talaga kaya ako nagpupunta rito,” Cindy Carigitan said. Mon, 25 May 2020 21:37:13 +0800
Greenhills Shopping Center prepares for reopening amid MECQ tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739720 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/739720/greenhills-shopping-center-prepares-for-reopening-amid-mecq/story/ The Greenhills Shopping Center in San Juan will start to implement safety measures once they reopen the establishment to the public amid the modified enhanced community quarantine. Mon, 25 May 2020 21:23:15 +0800

Mon, 25 May 2020 21:16:54 +0800
Netherlands reports 2nd worker likely infected by mink tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739716 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739716/netherlands-reports-2nd-worker-likely-infected-by-mink/story/ A second Dutch worker has likely been infected with coronavirus on a mink farm, but the risk of further contagion remains low, the agriculture minister said Monday. Mon, 25 May 2020 20:57:11 +0800
Novaliches District Hospital to scale down ops after health workers test positive for COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739715 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/739715/novaliches-district-hospital-to-scale-down-ops-after-health-workers-test-positive-for-covid-19/story/ The Novaliches District Hospital will temporarily limit its operations after 22 of its staff contracted the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). Mon, 25 May 2020 20:52:16 +0800
DOJ strengthens cybercrime monitoring amid COVID-19 pandemic, says Duterte tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739710 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739710/doj-strengthens-cybercrime-monitoring-amid-covid-19-pandemic-says-duterte/story/ The Department of Justice (DOJ) has intensified its monitoring of cybercrime activities due to increased use of the internet during the COVID-19 pandemic, President Rodrigo Duterte told Congress on Monday. Mon, 25 May 2020 20:51:50 +0800
